text: to sulemaan is baat se muskura ke hans paden aur arj qee paravaradigaar mujhe taupheeq ata pharama ki jaisee jaisee neamaten toone mujh par aur mere vaaladain par naazil pharamaee hain mai (unaka) shukriya ada karun aur main aise nek kaam karun jise too pasand pharamae aur too apanee khaas meharabaanee se mujhe (apane) nekokaar bandon mein daakhil kar
